name: It is not a bug, you died!
name_original: It is not a bug, you died!
description:
Kafkian platformer about a little kitten who is searching for his original body. 

A-D/ <-- --> - move

Space - fly/jump

Esc - exit 

Assets are partially taken from Unity Asset Store. 

Many things that occur in this game are intended glitches. They are definitely not bugs. The main character is not a bug, it is a cat.

Backtrace project -

https://gamewithoutasinglebug.sp.backtrace.io/p/it-is-not-a-bug-you-died/triage
